name: just-the-docs
description: A modern Jekyll theme for documentation

scripts.build: npm-run-all --parallel prepare:** && bundle exec jekyll build --source ./ --destination ../dist
scripts.start: npm-run-all --parallel prepare:** && bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.prepare:assets: npm run clean:assets && cd ../../main && cross-env DEPLOY_PUBLIC_PATH=/assets/js/ui5-webcomponents/ nps build.bundle && cd ../playground/app && npm run copy:assets
scripts.prepare:samples: npm run clean:samples && npm run build:samples && npm run copy:samples
